law.catch_line: Actions by and against partnership and partners.

text.section: To the extent not inconsistent with KRS 362.2-404, any of the general partners may be joined in an action against the limited partnership or named in separate actions.

A judgment against a limited partnership is not by itself a judgment against a general partner. A judgment against a limited partnership may not be satisfied from a general partner's assets unless there is also a judgment against the general partner.

law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 125, effective July 12, 2006.
